title: LSN -GAN: A Novel Least Square Gradient Normalization for Generative Adversarial Networks
abstract: In this study, we introduce LSN-GAN, a new algorithm designed to improve [::Generative::] Adversarial Networks (GANs) by implementing Least Square Gradient Normalization.
